org.waarp.ftp.core.session
Class FtpSession

java.lang.Object
  org.waarp.ftp.core.session.FtpSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.waarp.common.file.SessionInterface
public class FtpSession
extends Object
implements org.waarp.common.file.SessionInterface

Main class that stores any information that must be accessible from anywhere during the connection of one user.

Author:
Frederic Bregier

openDataConnection

public void openDataConnection()
                        throws org.waarp.common.command.exception.Reply425Exception
Try to open a connection. Do the intermediate reply if any (150) and the final one (125)

Throws:
org.waarp.common.command.exception.Reply425Exception - if the connection cannot be opened
